show_name: Dengeki Oshioki Musume Gōtaman: Gōtaman Tanjō-hen (OAV)
other_title: 臀撃おしおき娘 ゴータマン ゴータマン誕生編 (Japanese)
plot: Mari Amachi is a new student at the Perfect Religion Academy. When her roommate Saori Minami is kidnapped by the Black Buddha gang, Buddha himself appears before Mari. He offers her the opportunity to become Gōtaman in order to save her friend. Mari accepts the proposal and becomes Gōtaman, a sumo-belt-clad hero who fights to protect freedom of religion.
ending_theme: "Ari no Mama, Kimi no Mama" (ありのまま君のまま) by Noriko Noguchi
